name: chef.component.install
description: This task will install either Chef Workstation, InSpec or Ruby Gems into the Chef context
author: Chef

inputs.name: component
inputs.label: Install Component
inputs.helpMarkdown: Select the software component to install

inputs.name: gemName
inputs.label: Gem Name
inputs.helpMarkdown: Provide the name of the Gem to install. This will be installed into the context of Chef. CHef must be already installed

inputs.name: forceInstall
inputs.label: Force Install
inputs.helpMarkdown: Force the installation of the software even if it is already installed

inputs.name: sudo
inputs.label: Use Sudo
inputs.helpMarkdown: Use Sudo to perform the installation. (Only valid on Linux build agents).

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkdown: Version of the component that is to be installed. If not specified the latest version will be installed

inputs.name: channel
inputs.label: Channel
inputs.helpMarkdown: Channel from which ${component} should be installed.

inputs.name: targetPath
inputs.label: Target Path
inputs.helpMarkdown: Full path the file to be installed. This is useful for air gapped environments

inputs.name: habitatInstallScriptUrl
inputs.label: Habitat Install Script URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL to the script to use to install Habitat. The '.ps1' or '.sh' will be modified based on the os that Habitat is being installed on
